participant_1.background:
I love dressing up in hunter green, even if it makes my family laugh.
we have two sons.
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
i am a full time mom.
i have a poodle named nanette.

I love to support my local community by buying fresh produce from the farmers market.
I want to learn how to cook more healthy meals because I know fast food isn't good for my health.

i enjoy watching baseball.
my brother is currently couch surfing at my house.

content.text: Hi, I'm 32. I love to dress up in hunter green. It's my favorite color. My family laughs at me because of it, but I don't care.
Hi, I'm 36. I prefer to wear earth tones. I like to support my local community by buying fresh produce at the farmers market.
That's a great idea. I should do that more often.
I also enjoy watching baseball. My brother is currently couch surfing at my house.
My family is a bit on the crazy side, too. I have two sons.
What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music. It helps me cope with the loss of my parents.
I'm sorry to hear about your parents. What kind of music do you like?
I'm a fan of country music. I also like to cook.
What's your favorite dish to cook?
I love to make homemade spaghetti sauce. It's a family favorite.
That sounds delicious. I love to cook, too. I'm trying to learn how to cook more healthy meals.
That's great. I'm trying to do the same thing.
I know fast food isn't good for my health.
Me neither. I'm trying to eat more fresh fruits and vegetables.
That's a great idea.
I'm also trying to exercise more.
I need to start doing that, too.
We should get together and go for a walk sometime.
That would be fun
